pgTitle: Orders, decorations, and medals of East Germany

rows.text: File:Hans-Beimler Medal-Ribbon.gif

Hans Beimler Medal
(Hans Beimler Medaille)
Fighting in the Spanish Civil War on the side of the Republicans.
File:Bartel0012c2.jpg
File:GDR Scharnhorst-Order bar.png

Scharnhorst Order
Scharnhorst-Orden
For major contributions to the improvement of the GDR Principles of Ideology
File:Combat Order of Merit for the Nation and Fatherland 3 class.jpg

File:GDR Combat-Order for Merit for the Nation and Fatherland - Gold BAR.png
File:GDR Combat-Order for Merit for the Nation and Fatherland - Silver BAR.png
File:GDR Combat-Order for Merit for the Nation and Fatherland - Bronze BAR.png
Combat order "Of Merit for the Nation and Fatherland"
February 17, 1966

The medal was granted in three classes:
Bronze
Silver
Gold
File:Us redribbon rib.png

Meritorious Member of State Security
(Ehrentitel Verdienter Mitarbeiter der Staatssichercheit)
Outstanding contributions to the protection of the state from foreign intelligence
File:Medaille Verdienter Militaerflieger.jpg

Meritorious Military Pilot of the GDR
(Verdienter Militärflieger der DDR)
August 1, 1974
File:GDR Medal of Merit of the National People's Army.jpg

File:GDR Verdienstmedaille NVA 3 BAR.png
File:GDR Verdienstmedaille NVA 2 BAR.png
File:GDR Verdienstmedaille NVA 1 BAR.png

Medal of Merit of the National People's Army
(Verdienstmedaille der Nationalen Volksarmee)

The medal was granted in three classes:
Bronze
Silver
Gold
Image:GDR Brotherhood in Arms Medal.jpg

File:GDR Brotherhood in Arms Medal - Bronze BAR.png
File:GDR Brotherhood in Arms Medal - Silver BAR.png
File:GDR Brotherhood in Arms Medal - Gold BAR.png

Medal Brotherhood in Arms
(Medaille der Waffenbrüderschaft)

The medal was granted in three classes:
Bronze
Silver
Gold
Image:GDR Medal For Faithful Service in the National Peoples Army.jpg

File:GDR Med-Faithfol-Serv-NPA bar-5y.pdf
File:GDR Med-Faithfol-Serv-NPA bar-10y.pdf
File:GDR Med-Faithfol-Serv-NPA bar-15y.pdf
File:GDR Med-Faithful-Serv-NPA bar-20y.pdf

Medal For Faithful Service in the National People’s Army
(Medaille für treue Dienste in der Nationalen Volksarmee)

5 years service (bronze)
10 years service (silver)
15 years service (gold)
20 years service (gold) with colored flags on the medal and Roman numerals XX on the ribbon
Image:GDR Medal for Long Service in Fighting Groups of Working Class.jpg

File:GDR Medaille treue Dienste Kampfgruppen Arbeiterklasse Bronze ribbon.png
File:GDR Medaille treue Dienste Kampfgruppen Arbeiterklasse Silber ribbon.png
File:GDR Medaille treue Dienste Kampfgruppen Arbeiterklasse Gold ribbon.png
File:GDR Medaille treue Dienste Kampfgruppen Arbeiterklasse Special ribbon.png

Medal for Long Service in Fighting Groups of the Working Class
(Medaille für Treue Dienste in der Kampfgruppen der Arbeiterklasse)

5 years service (bronze)
10 years service (silver)
15 years service (gold)
20 years service (gold) with gold circular ribbon device
Image:GDR Medal For Faithful Service in the National Peoples Army Reserve.jpg

Medal For Faithful Service in the National Peoples Army Reserve
(Reservistenabzeichen)

18 to 24 months service (bronze)
2 to 10 years service (silver)
More than 10 years service (gold)
File:Vorbildlichen-Grenzdienst3.jpg
File:GDR Medal for Exemplary Border Service BAR.png

Medal for Exemplary Border Service
(Medaille für vorbildlichen Grenzdienst der Grenztruppen der DDR)
For exemplary performance and personal commitment in securing the state border of the GDR
